scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../phonebook-frontend && npm run build --prod && cp -r build cd ../phonebook-backend
scripts.deploy: cd ../../../ && git subtree push --prefix part3/phonebook-fullstack/phonebook-backend heroku master && cd part3/phonebook-fullstack/phonebook-backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && cd ../../../ && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && cd part3/phonebook-fullstack/phonebook-backend && npm run deploy
